summary: An Argonian that sailed to Skyrim from Black Marsh.
descriptionHtml:
Jojenheimer- The legendary Argonian warrior that has fought many fabled warriors such as Ji'adirr and  the storied dragon Shalerth, Eater Of Sheep.
[size=5]                                                               Lore[/size]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Coming from the Black Marsh city of Thorn to Skyrim, he made a name for himself as one of the best warriors of all-time. He fought so many people in the arenas throughout Tamriel that he got threatened many times and had many of his opponents that survived hire the Dark Brotherhood to assassinate him. Every time this happened he would avoid his death narrowly. He also had many of his enemies try to cheat by using extra padded armor and sharper swords to try to thwart his reputation. But he won every time. He came to Skyrim to try to defeat the legendary Dovakhiin and add even more to his name. He then realized that he could not defeat the Dovakhiin so tried to befriend him to gain his trust and some better connections to climb to the top of the chain [u]of command to become a famous and respected general                                                                                                                                                     
[/u][size=5]                                                         Requirements
[/size]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 You cannot be using Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood because he will not appear.
author: Jojoshabbadoo
